name: Vanguard Style
text: You can bring your shield to bear against dangers that threaten your allies.
prerequisites: Bodyguard, Combat Reflexes, proficiency with light or heavy shields.
benefit: While using this style, when an adjacent ally is required to make a Reflex saving throw, you can expend a use of an attack of opportunity to attempt the aid another action to improve your ally’s Reflex save. Your ally gains a +2 bonus to all Reflex saves while adjacent to you until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 你使用你盾在前方护卫盟友。
prerequisites_zh: 保镖APG，战斗反射，擅长轻盾或重盾。
benefit_zh: 开启此流派后，若你一个邻接盟友需要骰反射豁免，你可以使用借机攻击来尝试进行援助他人，来增强你的盟友的反射豁免。在你的下一轮开始前，你的盟友在与你邻接时获得+2加值在所有反射豁免上。
